alerts.authentication needed: Please authenticate in order to use features like ASR or word-alignment. After you clicked on "Authenticate" a separate window opens. If no window opens, make sure to have popups enabled in your browser.
alerts.combine segments ignore speakerlabel suc: Segments were combined successfully regardless of speaker labels.
alerts.combine segments successful: Segments with the same speaker label were combined successfully.
alerts.need playback: You need to start the playback at least once before submitting the transcript.
alerts.undo deactivated: You can't apply undo & redo at the moment.

asr.asr running: ASR is currently running. If you want to stop ASR for this transcription unit, click here.
asr.click on logo: Click on a service logo for further information.
asr.error: An error occurred. Please send us a short feedback for the error to be fixed.
asr.file too big: The ASR only supports audio sequences with max. duration of 10 minutes. Affected transcription units were skipped.
asr.maus empty text: The selected transcription unit does not contain any text or less than two words.
asr.max duration exceeded: In order to process transcription units with {{asrProvider}}, the duration of each transcription unit must be less than {{maxDuration}} seconds. Please make units smaller or choose another ASR Provider.
asr.max signal size exceeded: The file size of the selected transcription unit is too big. Please make units smaller or choose another ASR Provider.
asr.no asr selected: Please select ASR options before using the shortcut.
asr.no quota: No quota left. Please use another ASR provider.
asr.start for all next: Start it for this and all subsequent transcription units
asr.start this segment: Start it only for this transcription unit
asr.stop all: Stop it for all transcription units
asr.stop for all next: Stop it for this one and all transcription unit coming next
asr.stop this segment: Stop it for this transcription unit only

authentication.description: Close this window and click in OCTRA on the "I'm authenticated!" button in order to confirm authentication. After that the automated processing continues.
authentication.password reset success: If an account with the given e-mail is registered, you will receive an e-mail for password reset. Please have a look on your spam/junk folder, too.
authentication.window closed: This window will be automatically closed in {{seconds}} seconds.

boundary cannot delete: Cannot delete boundary because there are neighboring transcription units that are already transcribed.
boundary cannot set: Cannot set boundary in a transcription unit that is already transcribed.

browser.invalid: Your browser is not compatible. Please use one of the these browsers:

bug report.description: Please tell us what you think about OCTRA. What can we do better? Did you find any bugs?
bug report.error: Unfortunately your feedback could not be sent to us. Please send us an e-mail to {{email}}.
bug report.sending: Please wait for octra sending your feedback...

combineSegmentsWithSameSpeakerThreshold.description: Merges an empty unit between two units of the same speaker if it has a maximum duration (ms). Set empty to deactivate it.
combineSegmentsWithSameSpeakerThreshold.title: Combine empty units with max duration (ms) between units of the same speaker

sortSpeakerSegments.description: Moves all units with label "SPEAKER_<NUM>" to separate levels. Units without speaker are going to be moved to OCTRA_1.
sortSpeakerSegments.title: Move units with speaker label to separate levels

speakerIdentifierPattern.description: Regular expression with which the speaker of a transcription unit can be recognized.
speakerIdentifierPattern.title: Regular expression for speaker identification

table configurator.description: This tool enables you to create your own table format.
table configurator.name: Table-Configurator

dropzone.drag&drop here: Drag & Drop one audio file (+ one optional transcript file) here or click here.

meta data.description: Download the meta data that was logged while your transcription progress. (Only available when logging was enabled in the settings menu).

options.add newline: Add a line break after each transcription unit.
options.add samplepoints: Separate transcription units by sample points (e.g. 123456)
options.add timestamps: Separate transcription units by readable timestamps (HH:MM:SS.s)
options.timestamp notice: If you check both options, both time formats will be inserted:

g.agreement read: I have read the agreement and accept its content
g.name: Name
g.speaker: Speaker

login.api not available: The server is currently unavailable. Please try again later. If this error message is still visible after 15 minutes, please send an e-mail to {{email_link}}.
login.local mode description: In local mode you can transcribe audio files from your computer. Your data will not be uploaded to a server unless you don't want to use one of the web-services (ASR or word-alignment).
login.offline mode data warning: There is local data available that was created in online mode. If you want to continue in local mode this data will be overwritten.
login.old file found:
There is data from a previous transcription available. If you would like to continue your work, just drag & drop the following file to the gray box:

{{file_label}}

old version.click here: Click here to go to the previous version.
old version.notice: You are currently using the latest version of OCTRA. Would you like to go back to the previous version?

login.online mode continue: Old data found! To continue make sure to set the login data to: {{member_id}} , {{member_project}}, {{member_jobno}}
login.online mode data warning: There is local data available that was created in local mode. If you want to continue in online mode this data will be overwritten.
login.online mode description: In online mode you automatically get audio files for transcription.
login.online mode disabled: Online mode is currently inactive. Please use OCTRA locally.

maintenance.banner:
From {{start}} until {{end}} (expected) a maintenance is going to run.
In this time OCTRA is not available. Please make sure that you don't use OCTRA in this time.
maintenance.in app: From {{start}} until {{end}} (expected) a maintenance is going to run. Please quit OCTRA 15 minutes before the maintenance begins.

backup-notice.body:
Your progress is going to be saved on the server. Due to a known issue, it is recommended that you also download a local backup. This measure is temporarily necessary. Click on 'Download backup' to download the backup file and then on 'Continue'.

You can delete the backup files after the task has been completed.

feedback-notice.body:
To further improve Octra or fix bugs, we need your feedback. You can send us your feedback easy and fast using the feedback feature. You can easily and quickly tell us your opinion by clicking on the question mark in the upper right corner and filling in the form. If there is a technical problem, it is very important to send the feedback including the protocol to us as soon as possible. The protocol helps us to quickly diagnose and troubleshoot problems in a timely manner.

Thank you.

The Octra team

import options.introduction: The selected converter allows you to set additional options. Click on the checkbox to the left of an option to activate or deactivate it. Options that are not activated are not set.
import options.title: Import Options

inactivity.body: You were absent for at least {{value}} minutes without finishing OCTRA. It is recommended to exit OCTRA if longer absence is predictable. If you do not continue the transcription at the moment you can quit OCTRA now. What do you want to do?

modal.level remove: Are you sure you want to delete the layer "{{name}}" permanently?

login.text: Please check your username and your password.

missing permissions.description: OCTRA detected that it does not get the permission to play audio. In order to continue you have to grant OCTRA the permission to play audio. Do the following three steps and hit the "RELOAD" button on the bottom of this window.
missing permissions.step1: Click on the stroke-out play icon on the left of the address bar.
missing permissions.step2: Click on the button next to 'Autoplay'.

overview.check transcription: Switch to TRN-Editor and check your transcript.

shortcuts.2D-Editor audio: Shortcuts for audio playback on the multi-line signal display
shortcuts.2D-Editor viewer: Shortcuts for the multi-line signal display
shortcuts.delete boundaries: Delete selected boundaries and join transcription units
shortcuts.do asr: Apply ASR on selected transcription unit
shortcuts.do asr maus: Apply ASR & MAUS segmentation on the selected transcription unit
shortcuts.do maus only: Apply word-alignment on the selected transcription unit using MAUS
shortcuts.jump_last_segment: Save & jump to previous transcription unit
shortcuts.jump_next_segment: Save & jump to next transcription unit
shortcuts.save and next cell: Save and go to the next cell
shortcuts.save and previous cell: Save and go to the previous cell
shortcuts.save and under cell: Save and go to one cell under the current one
shortcuts.save and upper cell: Save and go to one cell over the current one
shortcuts.signaldisplay_down: Shortcuts of the signal display on the bottom
shortcuts.signaldisplay_down_audio: Shortcuts for audio playback on the lower signal display
shortcuts.signaldisplay_top: Shortcuts of the signal display on the top
shortcuts.signaldisplay_top_audio: Shortcuts for audio playback on the upper signal display

supported.header: Supported file formats for the local mode

delete.text:
Do you really want to delete the previous transcription and create a new one?

Your progress on the previous transcription will be deleted. This action can not be reverted.

demoEnd.exportText: You can export your transcript if you click on "Back" and then on "Export":
demoEnd.text:
You are currently using the Demo Mode.

Click on...
  • "Continue" in order to reload the current audio file. Your input will be deleted and the transmission of the transcript will be simulated.
  • "Quit" in order to quit OCTRA. Your input will be deleted.
  • "Back" in order to continue the transcription.

send.text: Clicking on 'Send now' will send your data to the Server to save it. You can not change your data after this.

sending.text: Your results are being transmitted to the server... Please wait for the transmission to finish successfully.

stop.text:
Do you really want to quit the transcription? During the transcription Octra saves your progress in a local storage of this web browser.

Decide on one of the following options:
  • Quit & release
    Your progress will be discarded and the task offered to other transcribers if necessary.
  • Quit & continue later
    Your current progress will be transferred to the server. You can log in later with the same credentials and continue transcribing. Important: Do not remove your web browser's data otherwise you will lose your progress.
  • Continue transcription:
    Choose this option if you want to continue now.
stop.url text:
Do you really want to finish the transcription? You are now using the URL mode. Your progress is not saved in this mode.

Make sure you export your annotation before you close Octra.

create project request.description: If you would like to manage your project with the OCTRA backend and have it processed by transcribers in online mode here in Octra, you are welcome to write an email to the administrators: {{adminEmail}}
create project request.introduction: OCTRA uses the {{octraBackendURL}} for the online mode. For security reasons, new projects can only be created by administrators who check the corresponding requests beforehand.

needed data.label: The email should contain the following data:
needed data.list1: Project name, abbreviation, internal description, external description (optional)
needed data.list2: Responsible persons (first and last names, e-mail address, institution if applicable)
needed data.list3: Who is authorized to manage the project? (First and last name, e-mail address) Each of these persons should already be registered.
needed data.list4: Visibility: public (everyone can participate) or private (only assigned users can edit)
needed data.list5: Runtime: Start and end time of visibility

create project request.title: Request for project creation

p.back to projects: Go back to list of projects

projects-list.introduction: Please select a project that you want to transcribe and click on "START".
projects-list.no remaining tasks: This project does not have any free tasks.
projects-list.other user logged in: There is some data locally saved by another user ({{username}}) from a previous session. If you start a new task the data from that previous session is going to be removed.
projects-list.project creation wanted: I want to create a new project
projects-list.same user free task: There are remaining date from a previous unfinished session (project: {{project}}). Click on "{{resumeTranscription}}" in order to resume the previous transcription or start a new task. Starting a new task removes data from that previous session

reload-file.another file selected:
Another file selected. Please select the same file as before or start a new transcription.

Wanted: '{{file}}'
reload-file.file not supported: Type of file is '{{type}}' and not supported.
reload-file.text: This application was closed or refreshed. Please select the same audio file again. After that you can proceed with your work.

segment invisible: This transcription unit has to be visible to play the audio contained within it
send error: An error occurred. Please reload this page and try again!

signal-gui.segment enter text: Please select a transcription unit by hovering over it and pressing the {{value}} key.
signal-gui.selection text: Please select a part of signal using the mouse: Click and hold the left mouse button and hold it while moving the cursor to the end position.

signup.data correctness: Yes, the data I filled in the form is correct.
signup.data policy: Yes, I read and accept the data policy.

success.email_verification:
We'll send you an E-Mail. Please click on the link provided in the email to confirm your E-Mail address. After that you can sign in with your credentials.

You didn't receive any E-Mail? Please check your spam/junk folder. If you don't get any E-Mail after 10 minutes, contact an administrator.
success.login: Your registration was successful. You can now sign in with your credentials.

signup.terms of service: Yes, I read and accept the terms of service.

boundary.description: After the playback postion was set in the audio player or signal display with this you can insert a crop mark at the text position.

combine phrases.description: With this tool phrases between silence are combined in order to reduce short transcription units. Transcription units containing silence shorter than a gven duration are merged with their neighbours.
combine phrases.maximal words desc: After the merge all transcription units will contain a maximal number of words. (Works only if each segment contains only one word). A value of 0 means that there is no limitation.
combine phrases.minimal silence desc: All transcription units containing silence are ignored if their duration is longer than this value.
combine phrases.name: Combine Transcription Units
combine phrases.warning: The word limitation is only possible if this tool is applied to an annotation with word segmentation. After running this tool you can revert the changes with hotkeys "CMD + Z (MacOS) or CTRL + Z (PC)".

cut audio.description: This tool offers to cut the audio file to sequences from the transcription units.
cut audio.name: Cut audio file
cut audio.warning wav: The audio file is going to be converted to WAVE PCM 16Bit, mono, {{sampleRate}} Hz during cutting.

transcription.invalid: Only valid transcripts are accepted. Please correct your transcript.
transcription.need audio playback: You have to start audio playback at least once before sending the transcription.
transcription.no prompttext: The prompt text can not be shown.

transcription submitted.want to do: What would you like to do?

transcription-submit.comment description: Short comment (Notes about workflows, waiting times, issues etc.)
transcription-submit.overview: The next table shows an overview of the transcription units:

context menu.remove selected lines completely: Remove selected segments completely (remove transcript & merge)
context menu.remove transcripts of selected lines: Remove transcripts of selected segments (keep boundaries)

permutations replace.description: Be careful: You cannot redo this action after it was applied.

speaker-actions.merge segments by speaker: Merge segments with same speaker label

new update.body: A new update for Octra is available. Make sure that no automatic processes are running (ASR, Word Alignment, Trimming etc.). Then reload Octra to install it.
